meanings.definition: Resembling a tape in shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The tapelike ribbon fluttered in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The tapelike bandage securely wrapped around the injury.
meanings.sent3: The tapelike streamers added a festive touch to the party decorations.
meanings.sent4: Her tapelike hair cascaded down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The tapelike pattern on the fabric created an interesting visual effect.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a tape.
meanings.sent1: The tapelike material easily adhered to the surface.
meanings.sent2: The tapelike adhesive provided a strong bond.
meanings.sent3: The tapelike flexibility of the ruler surprised the students.
meanings.sent4: His tapelike memory could recall every detail of the event.
meanings.sent5: The tapelike texture of the paper made it easy to tear.

meanings.definition: Long and narrow in shape, like a tape.
meanings.sent1: The tapelike road stretched out for miles ahead.
meanings.sent2: The tapelike snake slithered silently through the grass.
meanings.sent3: The tapelike hallway seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent4: Her tapelike fingers delicately picked up the tiny object.
meanings.sent5: The tapelike beam of light illuminated the dark room.
